Issue.creator: mrihn1
Issue.summary: PTE: Query Transactions Running On Both Peers In Org
Issue.description: We are seeing equivalent CPU utilization on both peer LPARs (A and C) in our cluster when running Query transactions. We would expect to see much higher utilization on LPAR A which has peer1 for each org, but utilization is just as high on LPAR C, which would seem to indicate that both peers 1 and 2 are receiving the Queries.
Issue.environment: IBM Blockchain Performance Poughkeepsie cluster ZBC03 (z14)
